item.title: The toughest interview question
item.description: What is the output of the following C code snippet? 1 2 int n = 1; printf("%d %d %d\n", n++, ++n, n++ + ++n); This is a tricky question. Any attempt to answer this question requires either a deep understanding of your compiler’s parser or a complete ignorance of C. Even if you fall under the first category and know the ins and outs of your favorite compiler, how do you know which is your interviewer’s favorite compiler?
